casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Twyan Kenneth COLEMAN 439P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 9, 2016 Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Coleman, Twyan Kenneth. Joseph E. Herrin, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of December 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of December 2016."
